name: Treehouse Night
description: A night theme for late night studying!
additional_info:
02-05-2014 - Minor bug fixes and visibility issues
* Gave the 'Total Points' text a light blue colour.
* The 'Achievements Popup' is now visible.
* Some visibility issues with quizzes have been fixed.

01-05-2014 - Large Video Player
* Updated the style to expand the video player to 700px (found in element.style). 
* Moved Right Nav down below the video.
* Removed the transcript as it disrupted scrolling down the page.


30-04-2014 - First Release
This is my first style. Please let me know if you experience any bugs. 
Tested on Chrome 35.0.1916.69 beta-m Windows 7 x64.
